/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with cars and buildings, stretches out below, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, predominantly brown and gray, rise up on either side of the street, their uniform color palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and white. The sky above is a clear blue, offering a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the cityscape.
